conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C and D.
Predict which container (E or F) it will flow into after passing through baffles.
There are baffles arranged in a zigzag pattern between the liquid sources and containers.
Liquid sources A, B, C, and D are positioned at the top of the image.
Containers E and F are positioned at the bottom of the image.
Baffles are colored red, green, gray, pink, white, and black.
Liquid from A will flow down and be directed by the red baffle.
Liquid from B will flow down and be directed by the green baffle.
Liquid from C will flow down and be directed by the gray baffle.
Liquid from D will flow down and be directed by the pink baffle.
The arrangement of baffles directs all liquid towards container E.
Final answer: Liquid will flow into container E.
